item.title: Elon Musk
item.description: Elon Musk is a visionary entrepreneur who is changing the world. He is the founder of several successful companies, including Tesla ðŸš˜, SpaceX ðŸš€, and Neuralink ðŸ§ . Despite criticism for his work practices and outspokenness on social media, he is considered one of the most influential people in the world and a role model for entrepreneurs ðŸ’¼.
